description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans various domains, including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like internet fragmentation, innovation practices, and sustainable collaboration. He advocates for aligning technology with nature and human values, emphasizing the importance of diversity and adaptability in digital landscapes.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and foster inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and regenerative design, emphasizing alignment of technology with nature and human values.
